summary: "Top Gear" is a popular British TV show about cars. It started in 2002, hosted by Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond, and Jason Dawe, along with a mysterious test driver called "The Stig." The show reviews cars, has fun races, and funny challenges. It moved from BBC Two to BBC One in 2020. After Clarkson left in 2015, new hosts joined, like Chris Evans and Matt LeBlanc. Recently, the show featured Andrew Flintoff and Paddy McGuinness. Unfortunately, "Top Gear" won't be back for a while after Flintoff got hurt during filming. It's a big hit worldwide and has led to live shows, DVDs, and versions in many countries.
title: Top Gear (2002 TV series)
